Title: Family Values
Plot: Marty's plan to spend time with Roscoe conflicts with an executive retreat, while Doug sees his fellow Pod members in a different light after introducing them to his new girlfriend. Later, Tamara offers an intriguing revelation about her personal life, piquing Marty's interest.
GuestStars: Mo Gaffney, Ronete Levenson, Nia Long, Jenny Slate, Eden Malyn, Annie Monroe
